title: Five-Star Bogor Pullman Stay with Sweeping Mountain Vistas, Multiple Pools & Four Onsite Bars & Restaurants
description:
Immerse yourself in a serene fusion of luxury and nature at this peaceful five-star retreat in West Javaâ€™s lush landscapes. Surrounded by vibrant rice paddies and tea plantations, this resort is the ideal escape, complete with a spa and wellness centre for total relaxation across 14 picturesque hectares.

Indulge in authentic Indonesian flavours at Damar Restaurant or sip a refreshing drink at the poolside bar. With four inviting pools, diverse dining venues and bars onsite, every moment here is crafted for enjoyment. Just a short drive away, discover the beauty of the Bogor Botanical Gardens and the historic Bogor Palace.
location_description: Pullman Ciawi Vimala Hills Resort Spa & Convention
offer_address: Jalan Raya Puncak, Gadog Megamendung, Bogor Megamendung, Bogor, West Java 16770, Indonesia

title: Jakarta Jungle Elegance with 18-Hole Golf Course, Two Restaurants & Outdoor Pool
description:
Escape the hustle and bustle of central Jakarta with a stay in leafy Bogor. Located within a lush, five-hectare tropical garden, this retreat offers easy access to the Bogor Raya Golf Course and vibrant local attractions.

Savour local and international cuisine at Verandah Restaurant or enjoy a refreshing drink at the Mahogany Bar. For relaxation, take a dip in the outdoor pool or explore the hotel's extensive gardens. Venture beyond the resort to discover the Bogor Botanical Gardens and the historic Bogor Palace
location_description: Novotel Bogor Golf Resort & Convention Center
offer_address: Golf Estate Bogor Raya West Java, Bogor, Indonesia, 17049
